job_tasks.phrase: creating highly realistic, emotional and life-like Synthetic humans through text-to-video
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the development of generative AI models for creating synthetic humans, a core aspect of the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: building a foundational model to represent humans in video
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of a core AI model, falling under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Research and develop solutions for audio / video data generation of humans in video
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions research and development of generation solutions for specific data types (audio/video), fitting the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Design methods and tools for data processing to create pre-training and fine-tuning data-sets
job_tasks.justification: This involves the design and processing of data for model training, which is a key aspect of 'Data Engineering'.

job_tasks.phrase: Investigate and propose new tools and infrastructure to accelerate the development of state-of-the-art models
job_tasks.justification: This points towards improving the infrastructure and tools for model development, which aligns with 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)'.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and run experiments to evaluate model outcomes for model training on our large scale compute cluster (petabyte scale data, multi-node, multi-GPU model training)
job_tasks.justification: This describes the experimental evaluation and training of models on large-scale infrastructure, a central part of 'Modeling'.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver production-ready solutions for deployment in our data and model training pipelines
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the creation of solutions ready for production deployment within existing pipelines, which is a 'Software Development' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the responsibility for engineering work to integrate AI models into products, aligning with 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: directly impact our solutions that are used worldwide by over 55,000 businesses
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the business impact and reach of the developed solutions, indicating an understanding of the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: impacting businesses at a rapid pace across the globe
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the business impact and the rapid pace of development, requiring business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate and collaborate across London, Amsterdam, Munich and Zurich research offices
Take ownership of the engineering developments necessary to ship new AI models into product
Investigate and propose new tools and infrastructure

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes 'text-to-video' and 'foundational models to represent humans in video', aligning with the GenAI Engineer's focus on generative models. It also includes core responsibilities like 'research and develop solutions for audio / video data generation' and 'large model training', which are hallmarks of this profile.
